meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tanner Hesse Eli Nehus Cheryl Guy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7445.

td.p: Tanner Hesse, a grad student and Navy reserve officer from San Diego, California
Eli Nehus, an electrical engineer from Fayetteville, Arkansas
Cheryl Guy, a high school principal from Columbia, South Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,600)

tr.td: STATES BY CITY TRASH-TALKING
THE 1860s
BIBLICAL BIG SCREEN
UP ON MT. LUSHMORE
RUNNING A HOTEL
BR-EXIT
(Alex: The letters "B-R" will exit a word and produce the correct response for you.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"Truth or Consequences isn\'t a choice! & Los Alamos may be the bomb, but it\'s Roswell that ends well!"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "Truth or Consequences isn't a choice! & Los Alamos may be the bomb, but it's Roswell that ends well!"

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
